events.message: The client reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with a street pole on March 30th.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident as the incident involved a car collision causing body damage.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the case and guide the client through the claims process efficiently.
An acknowledgement message was sent to the client confirming receipt of their auto accident claim and next steps.
Requested police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates to support the investigation of the collision claim.
Client submitted all requested documents, including photos of the damaged car and an official police report.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence to verify the facts of the vehicle collision claim.
Investigation concluded confirming the claim is valid with the client not at fault for the accident.
A settlement offer was sent to the client covering full repair costs plus a rental car reimbursement.
The client expressed satisfaction with the prompt settlement proposal and the communication during the claim.
The claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the client.
Insurance payment was issued promptly to cover the repairs and rental expenses as agreed in the settlement.
The claim case was officially closed after confirmation that payment was received and repairs were completed.
